long_description: The Zippo 4-in-1 Woodsman(TM) converts to an axe and a bow saw to help you quickly cut your way through brush. Call it a camping tool or a survival tool, either way it gives you plenty of options. You can also use the Woodsman as a mallet to drive in tent stakes and to pull them out with the metal ring at the base of the axe handle. 15 in. long bow saw cuts trees up to 4 in. in diameter. 5 in. long blade on the axe chops through wood for your campfire; use the back of the axe head as a mallet.
short_description: The Zippo 4-in-1 Woodsman(TM) converts to an axe and a bow saw to help you quickly cut your way through brush. Call it a camping tool or a survival tool, either way it gives you plenty of options.
